awards.text: Nominated for 4 Golden Globes. Another 16 wins & 34 nominations.

fullplot: In the 1840s, Cranford is ruled by the ladies. They adore good gossip; and romance and change is in the air, as the unwelcome grasp of the Industrial Revolution rapidly approaches their beloved rural market-town.

title: Cranford
